description: Manage server logs (log files) for a PostgreSQL flexible server.

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server server-logs download
commands.summary: Download log files for a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server server-logs download -g testgroup -s testsvr -n serverlogs/f1.log serverlogs/f2.log

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server server-logs list
commands.summary: List log files for a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server server-logs list -g testgroup -s testsvr
az postgres flexible-server server-logs list -g testgroup -s testsvr --file-last-written 10
az postgres flexible-server server-logs list -g testgroup -s testsvr --max-file-size 30
az postgres flexible-server server-logs list -g testgroup -s testsvr --subscription testSubscription --filename-contains serverlogs
